product_name: REI Fleet Capri Pants - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: From jogs to the gym to spin class or cross training, the plus-size REI Fleet Capris keep you comfortable no matter the activity. Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you comfortable by moving chilling sweat away from the skin; capris fit comfortably thanks to the fabric's 4-way stretch. Mesh panels behind knees help boost ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Elastic waistband with drawcord ensures a comfortable fit. Zippered lumbar pocket stashes valuables. You'll enjoy your workout without chafing thanks to the flatlock seams that are designed to move with you. Reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. The plus-size REI Fleet capris feature an active fit that offers a full range of motion.
short_description: From jogs to the gym to spin class or cross training, the plus-size REI Fleet Capris keep you comfortable no matter the activity.
